description:
Support for Windows / Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 has been deprecated in Liberty [1] and it is no longer supported in Mitaka.

The Log warning should be removed, as well as removing any usage of *utils modules using the old WMI namespace 'root/virtualization' and the CONF.hyperv.force_hyperv_utils_v1 config option.

[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/bb427da8581e6e952f221056745ce3cf3b990bd2
title: Hyper-V: Support for Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 has been removed in Mitaka

comments.content:
Support for Windows / Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 has been deprecated in Liberty [1] and it is no longer supported in Mitaka.

The Log warning should be removed, as well as removing any usage of *utils modules using the old WMI namespace 'root/virtualization' and the CONF.hyperv.force_hyperv_utils_v1 config option.

[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/bb427da8581e6e952f221056745ce3cf3b990bd2
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbelu

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit b81e7a322d524424e0ad4b064e2532202de52f6f
Author: Claudiu Belu <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Oct 20 17:19:07 2015 +0300

    Removes support for Hyper-V Server 2008 R2
    
    Support for Windows / Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 has been deprecated in
    Liberty and it is no longer supported in Mitaka.
    
    Removes the log warning.
    Removes the usage of *utils modules using the old WMI namespace
    'root/virtualization'.
    Removes the CONF.hyperv.force_hyperv_utils_v1 config option.
    
    DocImpact
    
    Change-Id: I1ec83f852d23758bc91da8fd8021b1bed34c63b3
    Closes-Bug: #1508066
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
